chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
cti: cronies_term_interface
tsi: term_sanity_interface
vci: votes_correct_interface
cci: cronies_correct_interface

Goal:
forall (h : name) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (st : raft_data), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) -> currentTerm d = currentTerm st /\ type d = type st \/ type d = Follower

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record cronies_term_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_cronies_term_interface { cronies_term_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> cronies_term net } Arguments cronies_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_cronies_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
term = nat : Set
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Notation currentTerm := (RaftState.currentTerm term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record votes_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_votes_correct_interface { votes_correct_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> votes_correct net } Arguments votes_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_votes_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
logIndex = nat : Set
Notation type := (RaftState.type term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record term_sanity_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_term_sanity_interface { no_entries_past_current_term_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> no_entries_past_current_term net } Arguments term_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_term_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
handleAppendEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (_ : name) (state : raft_data) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) => if t <? currentTerm state then (state, AppendEntriesReply (currentTerm state) entries false) else if prevLogIndex =? 0 then if haveNewEntries state entries then (RaftState.set_raft_data_leaderId term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_type term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_commitIndex term name entry logIndex
Inductive serverType : Set := Follower : serverType | Candidate : serverType | Leader : serverType
Record cronies_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_cronies_correct_interface { cronies_correct_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> cronies_correct net } Arguments cronies_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_cronies_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments AppendEntriesReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%list_scope _%bool_scope
Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet
handleAppendEntries_type : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower
handleAppendEntries_type_term : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower /\ currentTerm st' >= currentTerm st
handleAppendEntries_log_term_type : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> log st' = log st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ type st' = Follower
handleAppendEntries_term_votedFor : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg) (h' : name), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> votedFor st' = Some h' -> currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ votedFor st' = votedFor st
handleAppendEntries_same_term_votedFor_preserved : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> currentTerm st' = currentTerm st -> votedFor st' = votedFor st
handleAppendEntries_spec : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> currentTerm st <= currentTerm st' /\ (forall e : entry, In e (log st') -> In e (log st) \/ In e es /\ currentTerm st' = t) /\ ~ is_append_entries m
handleAppendEntries_currentTerm : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> currentTerm st <= currentTerm st'
handleAppendEntries_currentTerm_leaderId : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> currentTerm st < currentTerm st' \/ currentTerm st <= currentTerm st' /\ (leaderId st' = leaderId st \/ leaderId st' <> None)
doLeader_messages : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (m : name * msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> In m ms -> snd m = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> t = currentTerm st /\ log st' = log st /\ type st = Leader /\ (plt = 0 \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex (log st) pli = Some e /\ eTerm e = plt))
handleAppendEntries_log : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> log st' = log st \/ currentTerm st <= t /\ es <> [] /\ pli = 0 /\ log st' = es \/ (currentTerm st <= t /\ es <> [] /\ pli <> 0 /\ (exists e : entry, In e (log st) /\ eIndex e = pli /\ eTerm e = plt)) /\ log st' = es ++ removeAfterIndex (log st) pli
handleAppendEntries_log_detailed : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st /\ log st' = log st \/ leaderId st' <> None /\ currentTerm st' = t /\ commitIndex st' = Init.Nat.max (commitIndex st) (Init.Nat.min ci (maxIndex es)) /\ es <> [] /\ pli = 0 /\ t >= currentTerm st /\ log st' = es /\ (findAtIndex (log st) (maxIndex es) = None \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex (log st) (maxIndex es) = Some e /\ eTerm e <> maxTerm es)) \/...
handleAppendEntriesReply_log_term_type : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (n : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply h st n t es r = (st', ps) -> log st' = log st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ type st' = Follower
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
handleAppendEntriesReply_type_term : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply h st h' t es r = (st', ms) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower /\ currentTerm st' >= currentTerm st
handleRequestVoteReply_type : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data), handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r = st' -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower /\ currentTerm st' > currentTerm st \/ type st = Candidate /\ type st' = Leader /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st
handleRequestVote_type_term : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (h' : fin N) (t lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t h' lli llt = (st', m) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower /\ currentTerm st' >= currentTerm st
handleAppendEntriesReply_type : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply h st h' t es r = (st', ms) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower
handleRequestVote_type : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (h' : fin N) (t lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t h' lli llt = (st', m) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower
handleRequestVote_log_term_type : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t c li lt = (st', m) -> log st' = log st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ type st' = Follower
handleClientRequest_term_votedFor : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (os, st', m) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ votedFor st' = votedFor st
handleClientRequest_spec : forall (h : name) (d : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h d client id c = (out, d', l) -> currentTerm d' = currentTerm d /\ type d' = type d /\ l = [] /\ (forall e : entry, In e (log d') -> In e (log d) \/ e = {| eAt := h; eClient := client; eId := id; eIndex := S (maxIndex (log d)); eTerm := currentTerm d; eInput := c |} /\ log d' = e :: log d /\ type d' = Leader)
handleTimeout_type : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h st = (out, st', l) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Candidate
handleTimeout_type_strong : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h st = (out, st', l) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Candidate /\ currentTerm st' = S (currentTerm st)
handleRequestVoteReply_spec : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data), st' = handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r -> log st' = log st /\ (forall v : name, In v (votesReceived st) -> In v (votesReceived st')) /\ (currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ type st' <> Candidate) /\ (type st <> Leader /\ type st' = Leader -> type st = Candidate /\ wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st')) = true)
handleTimeout_not_leader_inc_term : forall (h : name) (d : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h d = (out, d', l) -> type d <> Leader -> currentTerm d' = S (currentTerm d)
handleTimeout_log_term_type : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h st = (out, st', ps) -> log st' = log st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ currentTerm st' = S (currentTerm st)
doLeader_st : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> votesReceived st' = votesReceived st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st
doGenericServer_type : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doGenericServer h st = (os, st', ms) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st
doLeader_type : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st
handleRequestVoteReply_log_term_type : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (h' : name) (r : bool) (st' : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output), type st' = Candidate -> handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r = st' -> log st' = log st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st
doGenericServer_log_type_term_votesReceived : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), doGenericServer h st = (os, st', ps) -> log st' = log st /\ type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ votesReceived st' = votesReceived st /\ votedFor st' = votedFor st
handleRequestVoteReply_matchIndex : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (v : bool), type (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v) = Leader -> type st = Leader /\ matchIndex (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v) = matchIndex st \/ assoc_default name_eq_dec (matchIndex (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v)) n 0 = maxIndex (log (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v))
handleClientRequest_type : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', l) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st
handleRequestVoteReply_spec' : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data), st' = handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r -> log st' = log st /\ (forall v : name, In v (votesReceived st) -> In v (votesReceived st')) /\ (type st <> Leader /\ type st' = Leader -> (type st = Candidate /\ wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st')) = true) /\ r = true /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ currentTerm st = t /\ votesReceived st' = h' :: votesReceived st)
handleClientRequest_log : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> ps = [] /\ (log st' = log st \/ (exists e : entry, log st' = e :: log st /\ eIndex e = S (maxIndex (log st)) /\ eTerm e = currentTerm st /\ eClient e = client /\ eInput e = c /\ eId e = id /\ type st = Leader))
applyEntries_spec : forall (es : list entry) (h : name) (st : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data), applyEntries h st es = (os, st') -> exists (d : data) (cc : list (clientId * (nat * output))), st' = RaftState.set_raft_data_clientCache term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_stateMachine term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output st d) cc
votes_currentTerm_votedFor_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (n : name), In (t, n) (votes (fst (nwState net h))) -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = t -> votedFor (snd (nwState net h)) = Some n : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments votes_currentTerm_votedFor_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
currentTerm_votedFor_votes_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (n : name), currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = t -> votedFor (snd (nwState net h)) = Some n -> In (t, n) (votes (fst (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments currentTerm_votedFor_votes_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : GhostSimulations.ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) -> gd = fst (nwState net (pDst p)) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

```intros h t n pli plt es ci d m st H.
destruct (HandleAppendEntries.2 _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ H) as [H1 | H2].
+ left. apply (handleAppendEntries_type h st t n pli plt es ci d m st H1).
+ right. apply (handleAppendEntries_type h st t n pli plt es ci d m st H2).
```
